item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description: "Among my most prized possessions are words that I have never spoken." -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description: "Happiness is not a life without pain, but rather a life in which the pain is traded for a worthy price." -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description: "Sometimes lies were more dependable than the truth." -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description:
"My needs are simple and few, thought Valentine. Food. Clothing. A comfortable place to sleep. And <i>no idiots</i>.
But of course a world with no idiots would be lonely. If she herself were even allowed there." -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description: "Because never in my entire childhood did I feel like a child. I felt like a person all along―the same person that I am today." -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description: "If you try and lose then it isn't your fault. But if you don't try and we lose, then it's all your fault." -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description: "This is how humans are: We question all our beliefs, except for the ones that we really believe in, and those we never think to question." -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description: "In the moment when I truly understand my enemy, understand him well enough to defeat him, then in that very moment I also love him. I think it’s impossible to really understand somebody, what they want, what they believe, and not love them the way they love themselves. And then, in that very moment when I love them.... I destroy them." -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Tamora Pierce
item.description:
"Frostpine made a face. Lifting the cup, he dumped its contents down his throat. “Auugghh!” he yelled, his voice stronger than it had been since his return from the harbor. "Are you trying to kill me, woman?"
"If I mean to kill someone, I do it," Rosethorn told him. "I don't try." -- Tamora Pierce

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Tamora Pierce
item.description: "Better to have it and not need it than to need it and not have it." -- Tamora Pierce

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Tamora Pierce
Tiyrna add a quote by Tamora Pierce
item.description: "A good friend will help you up when you fall. A best friend will laugh and try to trip you again. - I'm not sure" -- Tamora Pierce

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Kristin Cashore
item.description: "It seems better to me for a child to have these skills and never use them, than not have them and one day need them," she said." -- Kristin Cashore

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by E.B. White
item.description: "I get up every morning determined to both change the world and have one hell of a good time. Sometimes this makes planning my day difficult." -- E.B. White

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "A question that sometimes drives me hazy: am I or are the others crazy?" -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Anton Chekhov
item.description: "A fool thinks himself to be wise, but a wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- Anton Chekhov

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Anton Chekhov
item.description: "Any idiot can face a crisis - it's day to day living that wears you out." -- Anton Chekhov

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Randall Wallace
item.description: "Every man dies, not every man really lives" -- Randall Wallace

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Tamora Pierce
item.description: "You didn't kill him. He would have killed you, but you didn't kill him." "So? He was stupid. If I killed everyone who was stupid, I wouldn't have time to sleep." -- Tamora Pierce

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Tamora Pierce
item.description: "Every now and then I like to do as I'm told, just to confuse people." -- Tamora Pierce

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Tamora Pierce
item.description: "Men don't think and differently from women - they just make more noise about being able to." -- Tamora Pierce

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Cesare Pavese
item.description: "We do not remember days, we remember moments." -- Cesare Pavese

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "The reason I talk to myself is because I’m the only one whose answers I accept." -- George Carlin

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Gloria Steinem
item.description: "The truth will set you free, but first it will piss you off." -- Gloria Steinem

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Richard Bach
item.description: "Here is a test to find whether your mission on Earth is finished: If you´re alive it isn't." -- Richard Bach

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "We are what we pretend to be, so we must be careful about what we pretend to be." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Stephen R. Covey
item.description: "But until a person can say deeply and honestly, "I am what I am today because of the choices I made yesterday," that person cannot say, "I choose otherwise." -- Stephen R. Covey

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "I have the choice of being constantly active and happy or introspectively passive and sad. Or I can go mad by ricocheting in between." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "In the end that was the choice you made, and it doesn't matter how hard it was to make it. It matters that you did." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Tiyrna add a quote by Tamora Pierce
item.description: "Lord Raoul asked me to tell you that if you get yourself killed, he will never speak to you again." -- Tamora Pierce
